but I am inclined to think on 
reflection, that in this particular 
kind of research, the fault, if it 
be one, is upon the right side -
The figures are in a manner documents,
and from the manner in which they 
are executed will serve as important 
means of comparison - for those who 
are unable to obtain the original 
specimens 
T H Huxley FRS
The Committee of Papers 
Royal Society -
